thread.title: adidas Sales Continue to Skyrocket in North America and Across the Globe
thread.title_full: adidas Sales Continue to Skyrocket in North America and Across the Globe

author: Jonathan Sawyer
title: adidas Sales Continue to Skyrocket in North America and Across the Globe
text:
adidas‚Äôs sales continue to climb, as this week the athletic company has announced its year-end earnings for 2016. In North America, where they had historically struggled a bit, sales jumped 24 percent over the past year to $3.6 billion USD, while overall sales were up 18 percent to $20.4 billion USD.
‚ÄúWe have improved the desirability of our brands and products around the globe,‚Äù adidas CEO Kasper Rorsted said in a news release. ‚ÄúAs a consequence, we were able to increase revenues strongly and achieve a record net income of more than 1 billion euros for the first time in the history of our company.‚Äù
A large portion of the consistent sales spike is due to the continual output of coveted, innovative products, namely on the footwear front , with various Boost and NMD models.
Going forward, adidas expects sales to increase further, up to between 11 and 13 percent for 2017.
Bravo, Three Stripes.
